name: Mini-City Mayhem
description:
Mini-City; a city that thrives only due to the actions of one man, the only man capable of epic feats such as saving kittens stuck in trees and opening stuck elevator doors, he is

FIREMAN

(not to be confused with the pyromaniac fire-man)

Made By:

Emil Husted Legêne (art)

Søren Bach Nielsen (programming)

This was made as part of a game-jam.
